message: Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'sHasRemoteControlAPIs' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'sRegisterRemoteControlClientMethod' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'sUnregisterRemoteControlClientMethod' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
